summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4387 for the improvement of Crockett Street, from Dexter Avenue to 7th Avenue North; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51879, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
